ValidationRule.description: Ensures Role is not Blank if Rate Type = Role-based
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( ISPICKVAL(amc__Rate_Type__c, "Role-based"), OR( ISBLANK(amc__Role__c), NOT(ISBLANK(amc__Project__c)), NOT(ISBLANK(amc__Skill__c)), NOT(ISBLANK(amc__Rate_Card_Entry__c)) ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Role must contain a value, Project, Skill and Rate Card Entry must be empty
